response_rules.hello: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. This is an automated response.
response_rules.price: Thank you for your interest! Our pricing starts at $99. For more details, please visit our website.
response_rules.support: I'll connect you with our support team shortly. For urgent matters, please email support@example.com.
response_rules.hours: We're available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST.

default_response: Thanks for your message! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
